title: 820-3332-A Screen stuck on boot apple logo
message:
The customer tried to change the battery and after that, it stays at the logo.

I have tried to boot from an external hard drive/pendrive and they never fully load.

Any suggestion?

title: 820-3332-A Screen stuck on boot apple logo
message:
Did you connect back original battery?
At least try disconnecting new battery; chinese crap may cause weird issues.

Did you resolder U8900?
You can also try disabling GPU, just in case; easy to do on this model.

title: 820-3332-A Screen stuck on boot apple logo
message:
Yes, I tried with an original battery but it does the same thing.

Instead of resoldering it, I changed it.
I haven't tried disabling the gpu.

title: 820-3332-A Screen stuck on boot apple logo
message: Run corresponding ASD; OS version can test GPU.

title: 820-3332-A Screen stuck on boot apple logo
message: I have disabled the GPU and now it starts OK: GPU is damaged?

title: 820-3332-A Screen stuck on boot apple logo
